generated_body: If the user clicks on the article titled "I Used to Hate all Men. Then I Got Pregnant With My Son," they are likely expecting to read a personal narrative that explores the author's shifting perspectives on gender and relationships, particularly in the context of motherhood. It could also reflect on how becoming a parent, especially to a son, has changed her outlook, prompting her to reconsider her previous attitudes. This shift may be accompanied by reflections on broader themes of gender dynamics and parenting.
